meanings.meaning: on/to the verge of something/of doing something

vlive.korean: 오케이, 좋았습니다 - 좋았어 뿌듯해 - 이제 우리가 하려는 말이 뭘까요? Ok, good. - I love it. - What did we want to say? 듣기 View video MAMAMOO : 마마무마마무대대벅
vlive.english: Ok, good. - I love it. - What did we want to say?

vlive.korean: 하려는 거 아니야? Aren't you trying to do it? 듣기 View video ITZY : 오늘밤도 믿지랑 굿밤♥️
vlive.english: Aren't you trying to do it?

vlive.korean: [범규X태현 뭘 하려는 걸까?] [BEOMGYU X TAEHYUN what are they up to?] View video Mnet : [ONE DREAM.TXT] Reality Ep.04 - Part.2
vlive.english: [BEOMGYU X TAEHYUN what are they up to?]

vlive.korean: [계산을 하려는] - 그 순간! - 그 순간! [When trying to pay] - That moment! - That moment! 듣기 View video DAY6 : DAY6 1ST WORLD TOUR 'Youth' <옥탑방의 데식이들> 확장판 1부
vlive.english: [When trying to pay] - That moment! - That moment!

vlive.korean: [고기를 사게 하려는 스태프] - 네? - 고기는 필요 없어요? [The staff is trying to get her to buy meat] - What? - You're not getting meat? 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] “IT'Z TRAVEL ②” (있지 : ITZY)
vlive.english: [The staff is trying to get her to buy meat] - What? - You're not getting meat?
